metadata.description: ARM ID of a user managed identity that has contributor access to the source, target, and the resource group where the template is being deployed.
Subscription Id of the Recovery Services Vault.
Name of the Recovery Services Vault to be used.
Resource Group Name of the Recovery Services Vault.
The region where the original source virtual machines are deployed.
The designated disaster recovery region where virtual machines would be brought up after failover.
Name of the Replication policy to be used to create a new replication policy if protection containers are not mapped.
Comma separated values of ARM IDs of the Source VMs.
ARM ID of the resource group to be used to create virtual machine in DR region.
ARM ID of the virtual network to be used by virtual machine in DR region.
ARM ID of the storage account to be used to cache replication data in the source region.
Type of the Storage account to be used for Disk used for replication.
Type of the Storage account to be used for Recovery Target Disk.
